item.title: Chocolate Cake
item.description: About this cake and its variants This is one of my favorite recipes: The effort is very low and the result is amazing It is gluten free so it can accommodate guests that have trouble with it It can even be made lactose-free if butter is replaced with lactose-free butter or margarine and all the white chocolate is replaced by dark chocolate. How to melt chocolate and butter Bain-marie Bain-marie is my favorite way to melt chocolate for most recipes as it makes it close to impossible to burn chocolate.

item.title: Mushroom Paste
item.description: This paste has a high content of umami, which can be used to enhance and prolong a taste. It can be easily stored in the freezer in an ice-cube mold for later use.
